name: The Monster, The Cage
description:
The web build may need a minute to load.

A short visual novel.

Spi has been transported to a pitch-black land, a land in which the most terrible nightmares dwell.

The only source of safety in this land seems to be a cage, a cage that has light to ward off the nightmares. 

And inside that cage . . . Is a girl.

While playing the game you may come across some unfamiliar terms, you can refer to the little glossary below to help you in this regard:

WordPronunciationAncient MeaningSpiS-pee-MorMo-r-DaykDa-yee-kMotherMalaikeenMa-la-ee-keenAngelsTekeyaTe-ke-yaThe congruence of two pointsNaraNa-raHoly guardian

This novel was created for Spooktober Visual Novel Jam #3, which ran for a month. However, I only joined in during the last week of the jam. I do believe the quality and length of the game is reflective of that, but I hope you manage to enjoy it nevertheless.
